info.heading: Info and Contact
info.description: This (X-Men '97) is a mock website. Created to display to Disney, Marvel, and other companies examples of what the X-Men â€™97 series site could look like. Futhermore, this website does not sell any products or information, receive any payments, nor generates any money whatsoever from any of the content on the site.
